content: Signal Processing&Advanced IntelligenceSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationa) TinyGS and SatnoGS for satellite communication (Ground stations) (Click the image to visit our website for TinyGS/SatnoGS ground station at SPAI group.) b) CMB signal extracted from WMAP using INLA approach (Developed by Prof. Ji Won Yoon)c) Multiple Object tracking using random finite set theory (Developed by Prof. Ji Won Yoon)Signal Processing and Advanced Intelligence (SPAI) group has been established in 2012.
